item.description:
Join us for Sunday Brunch at the Lansdowne Pub, Boston. The Lansdowne is a cool Irish pub near Fenway Park. They have a reasonably priced brunch menu and they will have some free appetizers for us too! Relax on a Sunday morning with fun and friendly people and join us for a delicious brunch.

Everyone is responsible for their own food/drinks.

If you have trouble finding our group, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) near hostess area or at our table- please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Sunday Brunch at The Lansdowne Pub, Boston
